author: mr.mietrich
title: Sandbox-MMO for language learning
description: ゲームは時間や人生の無駄だと思われている。ほとんどの教育システムは、非常に不適切で、アクセスできず、差別的で、やる気を失わせる。

f6_assessments.q0: このアイデアは、カルダノのエコシステムにインパクトのあるゲームを作ろうとするもので、このチャレンジの目的に非常によく合致しています。作者は紹介文の中で、世界人口の半分にリーチできるように、ゲームを複数の言語で提供していることなど、非常に興味深いことを述べています（彼らによると）。ゲームは役に立たない」という概念がいかに古いかを念頭に置き、そのパラダイムを打ち破ろうとしている点が素晴らしい。また、MMOやサンドボックスに馴染みのない人にも理解してもらえるように、MMOやサンドボックスとは何かを概念化している点も非常に好感が持てます。つまり、それぞれの言語が世界を表し、プレイヤーは自分の役割を選ぶことができる、インタラクティブな学習空間を作ることが目的であることがわかります。また、このゲームとブロックチェーン「カルダノ」との関係については、コインをADAと交換したり、一部のキャラクターはNFTであり、プレイヤーは異なるDAOを形成するなど、情報を分散的に鋳造することができると説明しています。この提案は、遊びだけでなく学びのための非常に興味深い世界観の創造を促進し、エコシステムシステムの様々な技術を利用して動作するため、価値が高く、チャレンジで求められていることを満たしていると思います。
f6_assessments.q1: このチームは、すでにF6で融資を受けたプロジェクトがあり（どのプロジェクトかを記載するとよいでしょう）、同じファンドで他の提案もしており、彼らの仕事についてもう少し詳しく見ることができるウェブサイトや、各メンバーの簡単な概要やソーシャルメディアへのリンクを含む個別の説明を添付していることから、非常に有能であると思われます。このようにして、彼らが提案を成功させるための知識を持っていることを確信することができました。近い将来、何をしなければならないのか、非常に詳細なロードマップを提供してくれます。この詳細は、プロジェクトが複雑であるため、プロセス自体を完全に理解するために不可欠です。展開する活動の「全体像」を示すだけでなく、数ヶ月にわたってプロジェクトを説明してくれるので、具体性が高く、理解がより確かなものになり、好感が持てます。資金面については、高額ではありますが、妥当な金額だと思います。このゲームは確かに、企画書の説明に詳しく書かれているように、関係者が数時間の作業を必要とするプロジェクトであり、彼らは一生懸命働き、月給1200ドルを受け取ることになりますが、これは仕事としては妥当だと思います。提案書のこの部分はそれほど詳細ではありませんが、言われたことはここでも十分に理解を促すことができると思います。
f6_assessments.q2: チームはいくつかのKPIを提供してくれますが（そして私の見解では前代未聞のことですが、長期的なKPIを決めている他の提案はこれまで見たことがありません）、それらは比較的総合的なものです。それらを通してプロジェクトをモニタリングすることは可能ですが、私はもっと綿密なモニタリングをしたいと思っています、と言います。例えば、フランス語を例に挙げますが、フランス語ができないコミュニティの参加者とゲームの間に橋渡しをして、ゲームが一般に公開される前から意見を出したり、テストをしたりできるようにしてくれると面白いと思います。チームが情報の全体像を把握し、その結果をいくつかのタウンホールで発表してくれると嬉しいですね（複数形で言っていますが、先ほど言ったように、これは大きな複雑なプロジェクトなので、1回の発表だけでは不十分だと思います）。私は、チームがすでに提供してくれている情報を100％理解できるように、監査可能性についてさらに深く追求してもらいたいと思います。

f6_assessments.q0: This idea will make a big change to the way billions of people learning language and skills around the world because language and skills are important to everyone in the world that is unlike other game ideas is trying to get players to engage with their gameplay and style only. And with their vision of success and plan to work on Cardano network, I believe that when the team successfully launches it, there will be a lot of people joining and developing. Therefore, it can help to directly increase the gamer into Cardano communities as this challenge set.
f6_assessments.q1:
After looking around on their team info I think they can solve their idea well, they're all talented and skillful in their field. My only considering thing when assessing the feasibility of this proposal is risks on their way. Everything in the proposal is perfect but I think that they should figure out the risk for preventing them. 
Moreover, their detailed explanation of work and technology is one of the silver bullets that I believe they will finish their job very well.
f6_assessments.q2: They have a good roadmap and key metrics that can help Catalyst tracking when successful funding. And they have a very detailed explanation of how their awarded problems and ways they solve them. With those goals and visions, I think it's enough for auditing their work so far.

f6_assessments.q0: It is incredibly good that there are projects that bring value through playing and learning to the Cardano ecosystem. The problems that the team points out are real and it is great that solutions are being offered. The game through which it is learned and which has been translated into several world languages definitely has an positive impact on the Cardano ecosystem. It is great that KPIs indicated in the proposal match the ones indicated in the challenge and that they are able to scale future challenges and everything is in place.
f6_assessments.q1: This is a team with serious intentions and everything is transparent. There is an account with experience and skills that are necessary to deliver what is explained in the proposal. The website looks good and I could easily found all the necessary information and skills, knowledge that one team should have. The proposal clearly shows the budget needed for the project, but it would be better to have more information on how the team members will distribute the money. It can be seen that the money goes to the salaries of the people working on the project, but it remains unknown what will happen to the $ 4,800 money if they don't find another Plutus programmer. There is a detailed implementable plan and it is very well developed and the amount of money required is reasonable for this amount of work and the realization of the project itself. The team does not mention additional funding, so no additional plan has been developed. The team sets up real timetable to complete the work and the plan they gave describes the resources necessary to implement the proposal everyting is covered. The team in the proposal does not mention the possibility of potential risks so we have no solutions if certain risks arise.
f6_assessments.q2: The team made a great roadmap with milestones with dates which gives us confidence that the project will be realized. KPIs are also interesting because they are divided in standard KPIs and long term KPIs which is great because the success of the project can be measured. Yes, yes, the progress and development of the project can be easily monitored by the community.

f6_assessments.q0:
There are a lot of people still has strong bias to gaming that waste time and useless, it's one of the big problem within challenge. 
And this proposal show that they can make a change by their own solution that will make big impact to Cardano ecosystem. 
And the idea that this proposal make can drive million of people to join.
f6_assessments.q1:
Proposal show the clear roadmap and their budget is reasonable that help the team with minimum requirements to reach their goals. 
It also shows the team with their job in this project very clearly, and they're great skillful people in their field that can make the project succeed. 
Moreover, the explaination about the system will develop and game model are very clear to help us assess their work. But I think it's better if they can detail more about their roadmap and tasks of every individual team members.
f6_assessments.q2:
Proposal shows clearly the roadmap and KPIs that just enough for the auditability, but I think they should detail more the KPIs with the numbers. 
It also have a very detail problem and solution of their idea to solve them, especially they describe into case study that can help everyone easy to understand with it. 
That all clearly that can help CA and eveyone can audit the project and help assess it better.

f6_assessments.q0:
I think this project will drive a lot of people to their ecosystem because language and day life skills are always the important and vital things that billions of people need for their life, including work, study, travel... and their way of development the idea can effectively attract and keep users stay with the ecosystem. Indeed, it has a strong impact on Cardano communities when it succeeds too. 
I believe that their vision of success will make a big difference to currents centralized projects out there, they're all not designed like a game or even with gamification ideas, that's boring.
f6_assessments.q1:
The roadmap for the development of this proposal is detailed enough to estimate their works, and I think they can do it well with their experiences and skills. But for more clarity about the budget, my advice for the proposer is that should outline the roadmap in more detail because the fund you're asking for is monthly not by group tasks. Moreover, the outsourcing budget also should point to the tasks that will be used.
After reading some other proposals of this project I think the proposer should provide some risks and your solution for getting rid of them. This project is huge and complex to go without any risk.
f6_assessments.q2:
I hope that I can see some number in their KPIs, and should add some more key metrics related to the challenge setting that their project can get, for ex: language learners, gamers, social engagement... 
Indeed, they have a very detailed content of problem with case study and explanation, then they show how their project to solve those problems very well. It can help Catalyst audit the project well with clear milestones and goals. Hope that this project will succeed to make a big change to this world.

solution: プレイして学んで学ぶMMOで、安全で、アクティブで、探索可能で、コミュニティが構築された3D環境で学習体験を共有し、協力し合うことができます。
experience: UX/UIデザイン、フルスタック開発、Plutus/Atala開拓者、サウンド/ジェネラルアーティスト、プロシージャルモデリング、文化科学者、翻訳者、ゲーム開発
